casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION
v.
PINKNEY, et al. 229PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2016 Brian M. Rowlson, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for U.S. Bank National Association. Benjamin D. Busch, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Pinkney, Willie Lee, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Reply Brief filed on the 6th of December 2016 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2016."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 19th day of December 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
